rows.label: tlk45320124_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Everyone in Torigo Relay Base, from
the veterans down to the new recruits
is working their guts out.

rows.label: tlk45320124_04_msg0002
rows.name: All that training we put in is paying off.

rows.label: tlk45320124_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Hope we'll be able to get through
this crisis and get back to training
hard again.
